item.title: Stocks sink in another brutal day, as Trump's tariffs send global shockwaves
item.description: Investors, businesses and consumers all seem terrified of how President Trump's tariffs could upend the global economy.

item.title: National Security Agency chief fired as Trump ousts another top military officer
item.description: Air Force Gen. Timothy Haugh served just over a year as director of the NSA, the spy agency that collects cyber intelligence worldwide. He's the lates...

item.title: Comedian Russell Brand is charged with rape and assault in U.K.
item.description: The criminal charges were announced one and a half years after Brand was accused of sexual misconduct by four women in the fall of 2023.

item.title: The job market remains incredibly healthy â€” but the tariff storm could upend things
item.description: Employers added 228,000 jobs in March, showcasing a solid labor market. But uncertainty over tariffs and tepid consumer spending may weigh on job grow...

item.title: Trade war escalates as China hits back with 34% tariffs on all U.S. goods
item.description: Analysts say the escalating trade tensions between the U.S and China will make a near-term deal to end the trade war "highly unlikely".
